alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 5:34AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Feliciana, West Baton Rouge, Pointe Coupee, west central Livingston, East Feliciana, northwestern Iberville and East Baton Rouge Parishes, Wilkinson and southwestern Amite Counties through 615 AM CST... At 533 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Morganza, or 8 miles northwest of New Roads, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Port Allen, New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Addis, Brusly, Centreville, Livonia, Maringouin, Woodville, Slaughter, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete and Morganza. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 127 and 161. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
